name: Pokemon Coral Version
overview: Welcome to the Onwa Region, a region far away from Kanto and Johto. Onwa is the setting for Pokemon Coral Version, a romhack that sets out to recreate the feeling of playing Pokemon Gold, Silver, and Crystal for the first time. Journey through Onwa meeting interesting characters, earning the 8 Onwa League Badges, and working your way towards challenging the Onwa Pokemon League.
